title: Cosmic Xin Zhao skin
body: Why Cosmic Xin Skin feet so small ? It looks so improportioned with all that armor he has.  Like you are playing RPG n rocking All gear lvl 99 but your boots still lvl 1 . Can we adress this issue and get an update to that skin with armored boots ?

replies.body:
Italian server dude....

anyway i never noticed that....

Can you send us a pic?

In game it looks even smaller

https://imgur.com/a/5CgP5QU
